name: The Tower Prison (working title)
description:
You've somehow entered the mysterious Prison Tower. But as expected, there is no way out! Or is there..?

Defeat the enemies that stand in your way and steal their weapons, get stronger with potions and scrolls, and find the key to advance to the next floor until you reach the top! Will you make it out or will you die as a prisoner of the Tower? Your escape begins now!
